frontmatter.title: Is COVID-19 considered to be an organisational disease under ‘The employee’s compensation act 1923’?
frontmatter.description: The contracting of disease shall be deemed to be an injury by accident within the meaning of section 3 of the act and unless the contrary is proved the accident shall be deemed to have arisen out of and in the course of the employment.
